Package nl.naturalis.oaipmh.api.util

Classes that can aid in implementing an OAI repository.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NsPrefixMapper
    Decorates the final OAIPMH output with namespace prefix declarations.
    OAIPMHStreamer
    Class that can aid repository implementations in streaming the OAI-PMH they have generated to the OutputStream provided by the REST layer.
    OAIPMHUtil
    Utility class providing common functionality for OAI reposities.
    ObjectFactories
    Provides JAXB object factories.
    ResumptionToken
    Default implementation of IResumptionTokenParser and IResumptionTokenGenerator.

Package nl.naturalis.oaipmh.api.util Description

Classes that can aid in implementing an OAI repository.
Author:
Ayco Holleman
